system.description:
When you read someone, roll+weird instead of roll+sharp.

Your victim has to be able to see you, but you donâ€™t have to interact.

failure.label: Complications
failure.value: On a miss, ask 1 anyway, but be prepared for the worst. While you’re interacting with them, spend your hold to ask their player questions:

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value: On a 7–9, hold 1. While you’re interacting with them, spend your hold to ask their player questions, 1 for 1:

success.label: Success
success.value: On a 10+, hold 3. While you’re interacting with them, spend your hold to ask their player questions, 1 for 1:

system.choices:
• Is your character telling the truth?
  • What’s your character really feeling?
  • What does your character intend to do?
  • What does your character wish I’d do?
  • How could I get your character to —?
